lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. training camp outlook last Sunday referred incorrectly to the 2007 season for the Denver Broncos. It was the team’s second losing season under Coach Mike Shanahan — not its first, which was in 1999.
snippet: The N.F.L. training camp outlook last Sunday referred incorrectly to the 2007 season for the Denver Broncos. It was the team’s second losing season under Coach Mike Shanahan — not its first, which was in 1999.
